summary: Diff primarily updates user-facing copy to be agency-preserving ("selected moods", "choose") across login, compose/reminder surfaces, and Mood Analyzer; also adjusts Circle Energy generation to avoid clinical/inferential terms via a banned-terms filter. No clear evidence of mood auto-selection or new recommendation UI being introduced.

hallucinated_features.description: Added a guidance disclaimer in mood analysis that advises reaching out to a trusted person or professional (support escalation language) beyond the specified Scope 1 copy updates.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest Scope 1 focuses on removing implied inference/auto-suggestion language and avoiding clinical/diagnostic framing; it does not request adding new help-seeking/professional-support guidance text.

hallucinated_features.description: Introduced a banned-terms filtering mechanism for Circle Energy summaries (including a term list and detection function).
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-8 requires updating summary templates to avoid “feels”/clinical language, but does not explicitly request implementing a generalized banned-terms filter mechanism (implementation detail not requested).
